name: Rhythm Of My Heart ~ Musical Calligraphy
description: Musical Calligraphy is a spontaneous and emotional encryption of a song into abstract calligraphic artwork. Chinese and Japanese cursive scripts inspire the brushstroke flow. This artwork encrypts Rod Stewart's "Rhythm Of My Heart." The number of editions represents the length of the song (253 sec). When all are collected, the original painting with 1/1 token will be gifted to one of the collectors. Decrypt the content hidden in sound and animation!
